statements: SELECT id, user_input, intent, entities FROM chatbot_training_data;
SELECT user_input, entities, intent, id FROM chatbot_training_data;
SELECT intent, user_input, id, entities FROM chatbot_training_data;
SELECT id, entities, user_input, intent FROM chatbot_training_data;
SELECT entities, id, user_input, intent FROM chatbot_training_data;
SELECT * FROM chatbot_training_data ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, user_input FROM chatbot_training_data WHERE entities LIKE '%product%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT intent FROM chatbot_training_data WHERE LENGTH(user_input) > 10;
SELECT * FROM chatbot_training_data WHERE user_input LIKE '%help%' OR intent = 'greeting';
SELECT id, entities FROM chatbot_training_data WHERE intent = 'feedback' ORDER BY RANDOM() LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM chatbot_training_data;
SELECT id, input_text, output_text FROM chatbot_training_data;
SELECT output_text, input_text, id FROM chatbot_training_data;
SELECT chatbot_id, language FROM chatbot_metadata;
SELECT language, chatbot_id FROM chatbot_metadata;
SELECT * FROM chatbot_training_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT input_text, output_text FROM chatbot_training_data WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT input_text, output_text FROM chatbot_training_data WHERE input_text LIKE '%question%';
SELECT * FROM chatbot_training_data WHERE id IN (2, 4, 6) ORDER BY id;
SELECT chatbot_id, language FROM chatbot_metadata WHERE language = 'English' ORDER BY chatbot_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM chatbot_training_data LIMIT 5;
SELECT input_text, output_text FROM chatbot_training_data WHERE training_id = 1;
SELECT entity_name, entity_type FROM chatbot_entities WHERE entity_type = 'location';
SELECT intent_name, intent_description FROM chatbot_intents ORDER BY intent_name DESC;
SELECT intent_name, intent_description FROM chatbot_intents WHERE intent_description LIKE '%chat%' ORDER BY intent_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM chatbot_training_data WHERE training_id = 1;
SELECT input_text, output_text FROM chatbot_training_data WHERE input_text LIKE '%hello%';
SELECT entity_name, entity_type FROM chatbot_entities WHERE entity_type = 'location' ORDER BY entity_name ASC;
SELECT intent_name, intent_description FROM chatbot_intents WHERE intent_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY intent_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM chatbot_training_data WHERE training_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY training_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM TrainingExamples WHERE intent='Greeting';
SELECT example_id, question FROM TrainingExamples WHERE answer='Yes';
SELECT question, intent FROM TrainingExamples WHERE example_id=3;
SELECT * FROM UserFeedback ORDER BY feedback_score DESC;
SELECT example_id, training_time FROM TrainDataMetrics WHERE accuracy > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM TrainingExamples WHERE intent = 'Customer Support';
SELECT example_id, question FROM TrainingExamples WHERE answer LIKE '%help%';
SELECT intent_name FROM IntentLabels WHERE intent_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM UserFeedback WHERE feedback_score > 3 ORDER BY feedback_score DESC;
SELECT example_id, training_time FROM TrainDataMetrics WHERE accuracy >= 0.9 ORDER BY training_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM chatbot_training_data;
SELECT text_input, intent_label FROM chatbot_training_data WHERE intent_label = 'greeting';
SELECT training_id, creation_date FROM chatbot_training_data ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT entity_name, entity_type, entity_value FROM entity_data WHERE entity_type IN ('person', 'location');
SELECT training_id, log_text, log_date FROM training_logs WHERE log_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM chatbot_training_data ORDER BY creation_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT training_id, intent_label FROM chatbot_training_data WHERE intent_label='FAQ';
SELECT entity_name, entity_value FROM entity_data WHERE length(entity_value) > 50;
SELECT training_id, AVG(feedback_rating) AS avg_rating FROM user_feedback GROUP BY training_id HAVING avg_rating > 4;
SELECT model_id, precision_score, recall_score, f1_score FROM model_performance WHERE precision_score > 0.8 AND recall_score > 0.8;
